subject: Re: more echo chamber.
author: JanP
full_text:
Hi Frank,

As I am new to studying your designs and electronics in general, am I correct in assuming that the PVC has been cut and glued so that the pipes are open to each other, in effect one large chamber? Thanks,

Jan

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Chamber made out of 1 inch PVC electrical conduit about 4 1/2 inches long,
> the size was determined by how much room I had. Inthe vidoe at 5 seconds "a
> plane-hits the Earth".
> 
>  F-S
>
